name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Data Science and Machine Learning Engineer
profile_summary:
Experienced Data Science and Machine Learning Engineer with 13+ years in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python** and skilled in **machine learning** techniques including **scikit-learn**, **TensorFlow**, and **PyTorch** for building robust AI models that improve predictive analytics and automation. Expertise in **data preprocessing**, **feature engineering**, and **model validation**, ensuring high-quality model output essential for compliance-driven environments.

Capable of employing **Git** for version control and applying **statistical methods** for effective data analysis and interpretation. Proven experience in **data visualization** to convey complex data insights succinctly to stakeholders within healthcare and life sciences.

Additionally, adept in full-stack development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices along with CI/CD processes to optimize development workflows. Well-versed in adhering to regulatory compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 across projects.
